### Government of Canada Tender Announcement

#### Solicitation Number and Details
* Solicitation Number: T1610-230003
* Title: Water Transportation Services
* Date of Publication: October 10, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: November 8, 2023, 15:00:00

#### Contracting Entity
* Contracting Entity: Transport Canada
* Contact Information: 
	+ Email: [TC.atlcontractingservices-servicesdesmarchesatl.TC@tc.gc.ca](mailto:TC.atlcontractingservices-servicesdesmarchesatl.TC@tc.gc.ca)
	+ Telephone: (506) 961-9268

#### Service Requirements
Transport Canada seeks a contractor to provide safe and efficient water transportation services for its marine safety inspectors. The contractor will be responsible for transporting marine safety inspectors to vessels, primarily oil tankers, within the Saint John Harbour and its environs on an "as-and-when required" basis.

#### Contract Period and Extension
The contract period will be from January 1, 2024, to December 31, 2025, with the option to extend the term by up to two additional one-year periods.

#### Trade Agreements and Security Requirements
* The contract is subject to the following trade agreements: Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canadian Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, and several others.
* There are no security requirements associated with this contract.

#### Selection and Evaluation Criteria
* Tenders must comply with the requirements of the solicitation and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria.
* The lowest bid meeting all requirements will be recommended for contract award.
